Products.ProductDescription:
Badass Series : MRT KR Axle-Back #91U901
Loud, Aggressive, Take No Prisoners!

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT KR Axle-Back #91U901 has a aggressive, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finsish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016 and 2017
    Mustang GT Coupe and Convertible.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Other S550 GT models.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

The SCT X4 Power Flash tuner arrives pre-loaded with canned SCT tune files for most Chrysler, Dodge and Jeep vehicles. This device provides an interface to upload dyno proven tune files that increase horsepower and torque. Simply plug the OBDII connector into your vehicle's OBDII port and use the navigation menu to program your vehicle.

Products.ProductFeatures:
By adding the JMS BoostMAX Controller to your new 2.3L Ford EcoBoost vehicle, you will benefit from improved vehicle acceleration, as well as increased low and mid-range horsepower and torque. Add up to 5 PSI* via the Remote Boost Adjustment Knob. Dial in your exact boost setting and adjust it on the fly. The JMS BoostMAX module can also reduce the problem of noticeable turbo lag on EcoBoost engines. Customers report 2+ MPG gains in fuel economy when their vehicles are driven normally.

This JMS Boost Enhancer is a true "Plug and Play" upgrade. No cutting or splicing of wires is required, and all necessary hardware is included with the kit. This system installs in minutes. Unplug your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal Connect, and then connect JMS BoostMAX.

JMS BoostMAX Controllers can be combined with SCT Handheld Tuners and JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancers for additional performance gains. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits of this product.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Reach higher performance levels with your Camaro SS by coupling your setup with a performance cold air intake from Cold Air Inductions, Inc. These cold air intakes offer superior quality and craftsmanship, in addition to achieving outstanding performance gains. On average, consumers gain 19 RWHP and 20 ft-lb of torque with installation of the CAI, inc. cold air intake system on an otherwise stock 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro SS. Consumers can also benefit from up to 3 MPG in fuel economy. This is a direct replacement for the OEM air box. The kit retains the OEM washer bottle in the stock location. No tune is required for installation. CAI, Inc. proudly makes their Cold Air Intake system in the USA. Available in Textured Black, Near Chrome finishes, and NOW INTRODUCING custom paint and hydrographic options! That's right, break away from a standard underhood appearance and get your CAI painted to match your car, or have hydrographics applied for a carbon fiber appearance.

Call for more information, or to order a custom finished Cold Air Intake.

Cold Air Intake System includes:
- Aluminum insulated air box
- Removable air box with filter inspection window
- Thermal coated, billet MAF housing / intake tube
- High performance, lifetime-use oiled air filter
- Black silicone coupler / stainless clamps
- Custom finishes available

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2018 C7 Corvette Stingray Abbes Design Body Kit
Products.ProductDescription:
Abbes Design set out with the goal of producing a timeless Aero Package which blends in with the C7's factory styling, and they have done just that. The Abbes C7 Corvette body kit compliments the OE body lines so well, those who weren't familiar with the vehicles factory aesthetics could easily assume that GM just took a more aggressive look right from the factory. All of the components from this kit are made from a two part Poly Rim. Each component from this body kit had to go through the rigorous German Tuev and testing which is uncontested as being the most difficult automotive testing process in the world. As an added bonus, Abbes designed this kit to use all of the OE mounting locations, so there is no additional modifications that need to be made to achieve precise fitment.

This kit includes:
2 Piece Front Splitter
2 Front Fender Accents (lh&rh)
2 Side Skirts (lh&rh)
1 Rear Diffusor
2 Piece Rear Spoiler (including base plate)
2 Rear Quarter Panel Inserts (lh&rh)

Products.ProductDescription:
NOTE: FITS ONLY 2011 - 2014 Ford F150 3.5L EcoBoost (For other 3.5L EcoBoost applications, see part 73P000)

In minutes, dial in a custom boost setting for your Ford F150 with 3.5L EcoBoost engine with the JMS boost control module. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated 5 PSI of extra boost.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a custom tune.

The JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer will work on 2015-2016 Ford F150 models with 3.5L EcoBoost engines.

Each BoostMAX Kit Contains: BoostMAX Boost Enhancer, Plug & Play Wiring Harness, Remote Boost Control Knob, Installation Kit, Set of Instructions.

Products.ProductDescription:
Whether your looking to give your Mustang a lowered appearance, or need the additional down force at the race track, the functional and adjustable MRT Front Splitter makes a great addition to the 2015-18 Ford Mustang. The Front Splitter utilizes factory OE mounting points, making it easy to install. Adjustable stanchions allow the driver to fine tune the performance benefits of this piece. This Front Splitter comes with a Black Stipple finish, complimenting the 2015-18 Mustang side rocker moldings OE finish.

The 2015-18 Ford Mustang MRT Front Splitter is made in the USA at MRT's Headquarters in Plymouth, MI.

Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor Cat-Back #98U906
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor Cat-Back #98U906 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 3" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016, 2014, 2018 and 2019
    Mustang EcoBoost.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    GT, GT500, Bullitt.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductDescription:
Performance 400 cell catalytic converter with 2.5" inlet and outlet without neck.

Here are suggested steps for a proper break-in or warm-up:

  • Start engine but do not touch the accelerator pedal.
  • Idle the engine and allow it to warm up slowly.
  • After 5 minutes, increase the engine speed to 2500 RPM.
  • Hold at 2500 RPM for 2 minutes.
  • Allow engine to cool down.
  • Road test vehicle to confirm correct installation.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits some 2012-2016 General Motors vehicles, including the 2014-2016 Chevrolet Corvette C7, 2014-2016 SS Sports Sedan and 2016+ Camaro. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Camaro or General Motors vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitor, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

This JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller fits the following vehicles:
2014-2016 Chevrolet Corvette C7, 2014-2016 Chevrolet SS Sport Sedan, 2012-2016 Cadillac ATS (AWD & RWD), 2016+ Camaro

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor TurboBack : Race Cats #98U902
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor TurboBack : Race Cats #98U902 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 3" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016, 2014, 2018 and 2019
    Mustang EcoBoost.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    GT, GT500, Bullitt.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.

  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Hear the Difference

    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

Products.ProductName: 1979 - 1993 Fox Mustang MRT Fascia Mounting Hardware
Products.ProductDescription:
From the factory, the original bumper mounting hardware included small studs with a flimsy piece of steel that often bent. MRT has developed a sturdier replacement solution, our 1973 - 1993 Fox Mustang Fascia Mounting Kit. These mounting brackets replace your factory brackets and improve on the quality of the original pieces. Using a thicker gauge steel and longer studs for the brackets makes them more durable and easier to install.

The kit includes five brackets total. Two brackets are used to mount the front bumper to the front fender panels. The rear bumper uses the remaining three: the smaller brackets connect the rear bumper to the rear quarter panels, while the longer bracket runs the length of the rear bumper.

Products.ProductName: JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer : 2005 - 2010 Ford Vehicles
Products.ProductDescription:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits 2005 - 2010 Ford vehicles, including 2005 - 2010 Mustangs. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Ford vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration. The included dial allows you to adjust your throttle response from stock (0%) to all out race mode (100%) in a matter of seconds.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitors, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2018 C7 Corvette Stingray Abbes Design Front Fender Attachments
Products.ProductDescription:
Abbes Design set out with the goal of producing a timeless Aero Package which blends in with the C7's factory styling, and they have done just that. The Abbes C7 Corvette compliments the OE body lines so well, those who weren't familiar with the vehicles factory aesthetics could easily assume that GM just took a more aggressive look right from the factory. All of the components from this kit are made from a two part Poly Rim. Each component from this body kit had to go through the rigorous German Tuev and testing which is uncontested as being the most difficult automotive testing process in the world. As an added bonus, Abbes designed this kit to use all of the OE mounting locations, so there is no additional modifications that need to be made to achieve precise fitment.

These Fender Attachments are featured in the new C7 Stingray Corvette complete body kit. They come standard unpainted, however they can be ordered either painted or with a carbon fiber overlay for a more aggressive appearance.

Products.ProductName: 2008 - 2014 Subaru WRX, WRX STI Sedan MRT Cat-Back Performance Exhaust System
Products.ProductDescription:
2008 - 2014 3rd Generation Subaru WRX and WRX STI Sedan Cat-Back Performance Exhaust System
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 6 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 8.5 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX or WRX STI sedan
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Higher exhaust flow and lighter weight improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Cat-back system eliminates the factory mufflers for added power and weight reduction
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the cat-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • Single tip rear fascias require trimming for clearance of quad tips (2008 - 2011)
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, and 2014 Subaru WRX and WRX STI sedan
  • No tune required

Products.ProductDescription:
2008 - 2014 3rd Generation Subaru WRX and WRX STI Sedan Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Catalytic Converter
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 7 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 10 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX or WRX STI sedan
  • Elimination of factory catalyst increases aggressiveness of exhaust sound and adds louder turbo sound
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you
  • MRTs proprietary Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) includes a tuned resonance chamber specific to this particular cat-back performance exhaust system
  • DMS TM actively manages drone levels to increase the comfort of the driver and passengers inside the vehicle and provide a unique performance sound

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Replaces the factory downpipe and eliminates the catalytic converter with larger 3-inch tubing resulting in the fastest possible turbo spooling
  • Larger diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock downpipe allowing exhaust gases to flow at a much more rapid rate
  • Mandrel tube bending provides for the smooth flow of exhaust gases
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Larger exhaust tube and lighter weight over stock exhaust system improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the turbo-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Eliminates factory catalyst
  • Single tip rear fascias require trimming for clearance of quad tips (2008 - 2011)
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, and 2014 Subaru WRX and WRX STI sedan
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements
  • Custom tune recommended; call MRT at (734) 455-5807 for availability

Products.ProductDescription: To keep your car in Showroom condition between washes, FINALE was developed for those of us who like that fresh, clean feel of having the perfect car. Used by Pilots, Flight Attendants and Flight Crews around the globe, FINALE has built a reputation over the years for keeping VIP aircraft in such a state. Water spots, streaks and undesirable dust between washes are a thing of the past once you use FINALE on your automobile. Formulated for both interior and exterior surfaces, FINALE is an imperative step for every regular maintenance detail and in between FINALE allows your car to maintain that shine and luster of a newly waxed car between waxes. Its lubricating agents encapsulate dirt and grime allowing fragile surfaces on your car, such as paint, to be safe from scratches.. Not only does FINALE add a desirable shine and polished look to your car, but it also places a thin, protective barrier between your car and the elements.

Products.ProductDescription: When challenged to clean aircraft with multi-million dollar interiors and return them to looking like they were new, our detail teams at International Aero Services turn to IMMACULATE Interior Cleaner. Unsatisfied with every product we ever tried, we developed IMMACULATE to be the safe and superior cleaner that it is today. Trusted to outperform all other interior cleaners, our own detailers have built their reputations using this amazing product. To ensure that our aerospace clients keep their planes looking their best, we recommend they use this product between every major detail service. Now available to you, IMMACULATE is the secret to how flight crews around the globe keep their VIP aircraft looking brand new. Imagine how IMMACULATE your car's interior will look after using it. Use IMMACULATE on all your interior surfaces to give you that just detailed look. In just minutes, your entire interior will look sharp and smell fresh. Quickly and easily clean and maintain carpet, upholstery, interior plastics, vinyl, leather, rubber, metal and even audio/video equipment. The safe formula cleans, lifts off dust, ashes, dirt, grime, spills and fingerprints. IMMACULATE leaves your interior surfaces looking natural and revitalized.

Products.ProductDescription:
In today's modern aircraft and automobiles, there are many different surfaces, and many of them are made of rubber, vinyl, or plastic. All of these materials tend to dry out and crack as the natural oils (in the case of rubber), or plasterers (in the case of plastics or fiberglass) ; over time. PROTECT was designed to stop this from happening and ensure that your surfaces remain looking as good as new. In addition, unlike other treatments on the market, PROTECT has been designed to penetrate the surface it is applied to. This prevents SLING which occurs when products are applied to tires and then flies off leaving dirt spots all over your freshly cleaned automobile, which means no more dirt spots showing up behind wheel wells or down the side of the automobile.

PROTECT is formulated to recondition a plethora of surfaces.Anything from plastic, fiberglass, vinyl and rubber is a candidate for PROTECT's astounding protection and conditioning. PROTECT also prohibits UV damage and other natural wear and tear from effecting the look and feel of these surfaces.

Products.ProductDescription:
Formulated to remove heavy soil, brake dust and grease found on aircraft safely and effectively, AWAY is an environmentally friendly degreaser. It is a must that our degreaser perform to the very highest quality standards removing all dirt, soil, grease or brake dust from the surface of aircraft, while being gentle on sensitive components and specially treated surfaces. AWAY degreaser will replace a shelf or two of cleaning products in your garage. It works as a bug & tar remover, a wheel cleaner, a tire cleaner and an engine degreaser. AWAY cleaner is powerful enough to cut through grease on engines and baked-on brake dust even on roughcast aluminum wheels. Tar, sap, and bugs will break down in just a matter of seconds. This amazing product was formulated exclusively to clean, maintain and protect the extremely expensive painted surfaces found on private jet aircraft. Designed to withstand the harshest environments found on earth (and above), from a hot tarmac and temperatures that reach to the frigid temperatures found at 50,000 feet above the earth. SHINE was also designed and formulated to withstand the abrasive affects encountered in the atmosphere while flying at over 600 mph. With many airports around the world not allowing wet washing of airplanes, Aero Products developed SHINE in order to deliver the perfect Dry Wash Protectant. SHINE is a revolutionary new method of washing and shining your car and providing a protective coating on your paint in minutes, without water. No buckets, no hoses, no rinsing and drying! Simply spray on the surface and wipe dry. With SHINE you can conveniently and quickly wash your vehicle anywhere, anytime. The unique formulation dissolves dirt and stains such as tree sap and bugs. Special lubricating agents encapsulate the dirt so that it can easily be wiped off a car's delicate surface without scratching. It also leaves a protective film that provides gloss, color enhancement and smoothness that conventional car washes
fail to deliver.

Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">Nothing is more unsightly than major stains or heavy soil marks in your car interior, which make it look aged and worn out. SPOT has been developed over many years, and is the exclusive and trusted stain remover of our own professional detail teams on Corporate, Heads-of State and VIP jets all around the globe. SPOT will allow you to maintain your carpet and fabric upholstery just as owners of VIP aircraft have for years. SPOT allows every driver to have pristine, impeccable carpet and fabric upholstery. Whether using SPOT to treat a large area or a persnickety, set-in stain from juice or stubborn dirt, the results are Spotless. While some carpet and fabric cleaners leave residues that attract dirt for future stains and spots, SPOT does not leave film and will keep the surface looking flawless. SPOT, which is perfect for colorfast carpet and fabric surfaces, is an all natural cleaner making it both biodegradable and perfect for your car.</inline>
